data.text: @cerealboss97 I think the best thing to do is to try & ignore negativity & surround yourself with positivity.
@cerealboss97 Thanks dude. I’m generally an optimistic person, but even I have my bad days.
@snorbertd1 It's more likely that you're just being more aware and into news. I don't think this negativity is exclusive to the past 2 years.
Is this just me being more aware & into news & negative stuff like this, or is the world just getting way more negative & depressing?

And yes, I'm aware that stuff like this happens pretty much every year. But as of late, I feel like the negativity has gotten more prevalent & more negative.

(Also, typo, I meant 2017 & 2018 so far have been depressing years)
